content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone furnace setup at position(1, 1) and (3, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (1.0, 1.0)) and inserter that puts iron ore into it
- Stone furnace (position (3.0, 0.0)) and inserter that puts iron ore into it

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace has enough capacity to accept the items before inserting. Check the inventory of the furnace to avoid inserting items when it is full.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the target tile.
